GeneDef.label: orkskin
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a reserve of biological strength powered by a resource called hemogen. The resource can be gained and spent in various ways, all of which are unlocked by other genes.\n\nCarriers lose 2 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
GeneDef.resourceDescription:
A reserve of biological strength which can be gained and spent in a variety of ways.

Hemogen can be increased by bloodfeeding from a human or consuming hemogen packs. You can obtain hemogen packs using the 'extract hemogen pack' medical operation on a non-hemogenic human.

If hemogen reaches zero, {PAWN_nameDef} will become very unhappy.
